import React, {useContext} from 'react' import TransactionIndexModule from '../Components/Transaction_Index_Module' import AppContext from '../AppContext' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' function Transactions() { const {user, handleTransactionSeed, accounts, handleAccountDeletion, deleteState} = useContext(AppContext); const { id } = useParams() const navigate = useNavigate(); const account = accounts.find((account) => parseInt(account.id) === parseInt(id)) return (
